title: State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Col. 37 (Israel 9)
description:
State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 37 (Israel 9):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Abdallah & Parizot - Israelis and Palestinians in the Shadows of the Wall; Spaces of Separation and Occupation (2015)

-  Al-Hardan - Palestinians in Syria; Nakba Memoirs of Shattered Communities (2016)

-  Barnidge - Self-Determination, Statehood, and the Law of Negotiation; the Case of Palestine (2016)

-  Baroud - My Father Was a Freedom Fighter; Gaza's Untold Story (2010)

-  Ben-Zvi - The Origins of the American-Israeli Alliance; the Jordanian Factor (2007)

-  Bleaney - Israel and the West Bank and Gaza Strip, World Bibliographical Series, Vol. 58 (1994)

-  Davis - Freedom is a Constant Struggle; Ferguson, Palestine, and the Foundation of a Movement (2016)

-  Ehrenreich - The Way to the Spring; Life and Death in Palestine (2016)

-  Ellis - Israel and Palestine, Out of the Ashes; the Search of the Jewish Identity in the 21st Century (2002)

-  Ephron - Killing a King; the Assassination of Yitzhak Rabin and the Remaking of Israel (2015)

-  Falk - Palestine; the Legitimacy of Hope (2014)

-  Feldman - A Shadow Over Palestine; the Imperial Life of Race in America (2015)

-  Ghanem - The Palestinian-Arab Minority in Israel, 1948-2000 (2001)

-  Gunn - Second Life; a West Bank Memoir (1995)

-  Hamed - Speaking the Unspeakable; Sounds of the Middle East Conflict (2016)

-  Kannaneh - Birthing the Nation; Strategies of Palestinian Women in Israel (2002)

-  Kotef - Movement and the Ordering of Freedom; On Liberal Governances of Mobility (2015)

-  Kretzmer - The Occupation of Justice; the Supreme Court of Israel and the Occupied Territories (2002)

-  Kuriansky - Terror in the Holy Land; Inside the Anguish of the Israeli-Palestinian Conflict (2006)

-  Lukacs (Ed.) - The Israeli-Palestinian Conflict; a Documentary Record, 1967-1990 (1992)

-  Nasser - Palestinian Identity in Jordan and Israel; the Necessary 'Other' in the Making of a Nation (2005)

-  Payes - Palestinian NGOs in Israel; the Politics of Civil Society (2005)

-  Rejwan - Outsider in the Promised Land; an Iraqi Jew in Israel (2006)

-  Sabbagh - Palestinian Women of Gaza and the West Bank (1998)

-  Saif - The Drone Eats with Me; a Gaza Diary (2014)

-  Salinas - Planting Hatred, Sowing Pain; the Psychology of the Israeli-Palestinian Conflict (2007)

-  Segal - No Place for Grief; Martyrs, Prisoners, and Mourning in Contemporary Palestine (2016)

-  Shehadeh - Occupation Diaries (2012)

-  Shulman - Dark Hope; Working for Peace in Israel and Palestine (2007)

-  Tessler - A History of the Israeli-Palestinian Conflict, 2e (2009)

-  Thomas - Extreme Rambling; Walking Israel's Barrier for Fun (2011)

-  Tiripelli - Media and Peace in the Middle East; the Role of Journalism in Israel-Palestine (2016)

-  White - Palestinians in Israel; Segregation, Discrimination and Democracy (2012)

-  Whitelam - The Invention of Ancient Israel; the Silencing of Palestinian History (1996)

-  Winslow - Victory for Us Is to See You Suffer; In the West Bank with the Palestinians and the Israelis (2007)
